data.comment: The match is underway in London.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
In the minute 1, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Newcastle have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 3, Important block from the Crystal Palace defence as Joelinton fires in a strike for Newcastle.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Crystal Palace.
Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Newcastle, close to Crystal Palace's area.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Throw-in for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In London Newcastle attack through Joelinton. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 10, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 13, Graham Scott signals a Newcastle throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 15, Newcastle to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Graham Scott signals a Newcastle throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
In the minute 17, Federico Fernandez (Newcastle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Newcastle surge into the attack at Selhurst Park but Joelintonâ€™s header is off-target.
Graham Scott awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
In the minute 20, Joelinton gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Newcastle.
In the minute 25, In London Crystal Palace drive forward through Eberechi Eze. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
Joelinton is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 27, Newcastle's Joelinton is back in action after a slight knock.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace pushes forward through Jeffrey Schlupp, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 30, Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 36, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle's Jamal Lewis gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Graham Scott waits before resuming play because Cheikhou Kouyate for Crystal Palace is still down.
In the minute 42, Cheikhou Kouyate has recovered and rejoins the match in London.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
Joelinton for Newcastle drives towards goal at Selhurst Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Crystal Palace attack but Jeffrey Schlupp's header doesn't find the target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Newcastle.
Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in London.
The second half has started at Selhurst Park.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 49, Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 51, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In London, Gary Cahill (Crystal Palace) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 54, Jordan Ayew of Crystal Palace gets in a strike, but is off target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 55, Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Jonjo Shelvey (Newcastle) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in London.
In the minute 58, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Crystal Palace is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Crystal Palace close to the penalty box.
In the minute 60, Sean Longstaff for Newcastle has been booked by Graham Scott and receives a first yellow card.
Crystal Palace drive upfield and Patrick Van Aanholt gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Newcastle defender.
Goal kick for Newcastle at Selhurst Park.
In the minute 62, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace are coming forward and Eberechi Eze gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Graham Scott signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Newcastle's half.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Crystal Palace's Cheikhou Kouyate breaks free at Selhurst Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Graham Scott awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Christian Benteke is replacing Jordan Ayew for Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 67, Callum Wilson (Newcastle) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Graham Scott awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Crystal Palace make their second substitution with Jairo Riedewald replacing Andros Townsend.
In the minute 68, Newcastle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Matt Ritchie is on a sub for Miguel Almiron for Newcastle.
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
Newcastle surge into the attack at Selhurst Park but Joelintonâ€™s header is off-target.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Christian Benteke for Crystal Palace gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Graham Scott awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
In the minute 75, Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle.
Scott Dann (Crystal Palace) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 79, Newcastle's Matt Ritchie gets in a shot on goal at Selhurst Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Newcastle.
Christian Benteke (Crystal Palace) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 81, Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Roy Hodgson is making the team's third substitution at Selhurst Park with Michy Batshuayi replacing James McArthur.
In the minute 83, Javi Manquillo (Newcastle) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cheikhou Kouyate for Crystal Palace drives towards goal at Selhurst Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 85, Graham Scott signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Crystal Palace's Patrick Van Aanholt gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 86, Graham Scott signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
Can Crystal Palace capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 88, Callum Wilson scores to make it 0-1 at Selhurst Park.
That's a fine assist from Joelinton.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Newcastle are in shooting range from this free kick.
Jonjo Shelvey gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Graham Scott blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Goal! Newcastle extend their lead to 0-2 through Joelinton.
At Selhurst Park, Jeffrey Schlupp has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Steve Bruce (Newcastle) is making a second substitution, with Fabian Schar replacing Joelinton.
